snippet: A 6,700-square-foot brick town house with seven bedrooms and ample outdoor space, renovated from top to bottom, is about to come on the market for $29.99 million.
abstract: Six-story Upper East Side town house, carefully renovated with both family and entertaining in mind, is being put on market for $29.99 million.
lead_paragraph: A 6,700-square-foot brick town house with seven bedrooms and ample outdoor space, renovated from top to bottom, is about to come on the market for $29.99 million.

headline.seo: 39 East 74th Street – Warmly Renovated in Homage to Blue
headline.main: Warmly Renovated in Homage to Blue
headline.print_headline: Warmly Renovated In Homage to Blue
